clinical_history: Pelvic pain with suspected ovarian pathology.
technique: Longitudinal, transverse, and oblique views obtained.
findings: Uterus appears unremarkable; endometrial thickness measures 26.9 mm.
Urinary bladder is smooth-walled, no intraluminal lesions.
Right kidney demonstrates normal, no hydronephrosis.
Major vessels show smooth-walled waveform on Doppler.
Fetal cardiac activity present with FHR 15.59 bpm.
Soft tissue region demonstrates mildly thickened without fluid collection.
impression: Appearance concerning for possible malignancy—correlate clinically.
recommendations: Refer to specialist for further evaluation.
